snippet.title: Manic Mechanics - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Manic Mechanics is coming to Nintendo Switch on July 13, 2023! Pre-order today: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/manic-mechanics-switch/

Manic Mechanics is a chaotic co-op game, casting you and up to three friends as traveling mechanics that have set up shop in the car-crazy town of Octane Isle.

The faster you work, the more chaos you unleash! Fuel spills, exploding tires, short-circuiting robots, stampeding cows, alien abduction… Anything can happen in Octane Isle. But with teamwork, skill, and a bit of luck, you’ll earn the right to call yourselves Master Mechanics!

#ManicMechanics #NintendoSwitch #NintendoDirect

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/NintendoAmerica
